name: Cashier Simulator 2020
description:
Welcome to Cashier Simulator 2020, an intentionally bad game where you play as a minimum wage worker in a grocery store.

The goal is simple: pack some items, get paid (or not), shoot down robbers before they get to put their filthy hands on your cash, and uh... yeah that's pretty much it.

By the way this game is just a small project made for fun, and in fact it is more of an experiment than an actual game.

Feel free to give me some feedback either in the comment section or at ronochinoentertainment@gmail.com, but please be constructive.
